languages.text: {n}Воспоминания о последних минутах сбивчивы и мучительны. Вспышка колдовства, прыжок в неизвестность, крик Соломона — он отдал приказ Глейто, но какой? Любая попытка осознать произошедшее лишь глубже погружает в беспамятство...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Воспоминания о последних минутах сбивчивы и мучительны. Вспышка колдовства, прыжок в неизвестность, крик Соломона — он отдал приказ Глейто, но какой? Любая попытка осознать произошедшее лишь глубже погружает в беспамятство...{/n}

languages.text: {n}Your memories of the last several minutes are incoherent and painful. The flash of sorcery, the leap into the unknown, Solomorne shouting something — he gave Glaito an order, but what order was it? Any attempt you make to process what happened only pulls you deeper into unconsciousness.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Воспоминания о последних минутах сбивчивы и мучительны. Вспышка колдовства, прыжок в неизвестность, крик Соломона — он отдал приказ Глейто, но какой? Любая попытка осознать произошедшее лишь сильнее затягивает вас в беспамятство.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The memories of your last several minutes are incoherent and painful. The flash of sorcery, the leap into the unknown, Solomorne shouting something — he gave Glaito an order, but what order was it? Any attempt you make to process what happened only pulls you deeper into unconsciousness.{/n}

{n}Your memories of the last several minutes are incoherent and painful. The flash of sorcery, the leap into the unknown, Solomorne shouting something — he gave Glaito an order, but what order was it? Any attempt you make to process what happened only pulls you deeper into unconsciousness.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Deine Erinnerungen an die letzten Minuten sind unzusammenhängend und schmerzlich. Die Magie, der Sprung in das Unbekannte, Solomorne, der etwas ruft ... er hat Glaito etwas befohlen, aber was? Jeder Versuch, dich zu erinnern, reißt dich nur noch tiefer in die Bewusstlosigkeit.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your memories of the last several minutes are incoherent and painful. The flash of sorcery, the leap into the unknown, Solomorne shouting something — he gave Glaito an order, but what order was it? Any attempt you make to process what happened only pulls you deeper into unconsciousness.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Deine Erinnerungen an die letzten Minuten sind unzusammenhängend und schmerzlich. Die Magie, der Sprung in das Unbekannte, Solomorne, der etwas ruft ... er hat Glaito etwas befohlen, aber was? Jeder Versuch, dich zu erinnern, reißt dich nur noch tiefer in die Bewusstlosigkeit.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vos souvenirs des dernières minutes sont incohérents et douloureux. L'éclat de sorcellerie, le saut dans l'inconnu, les cris de Solomorne... Il a donné un ordre à Glaito, mais lequel ? Alors que vous tentez de comprendre ce qui s'est passé, vous sombrez de plus en plus dans l'inconscience.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your memories of the last several minutes are incoherent and painful. The flash of sorcery, the leap into the unknown, Solomorne shouting something — he gave Glaito an order, but what order was it? Any attempt you make to process what happened only pulls you deeper into unconsciousness.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vos souvenirs des dernières minutes sont incohérents et douloureux. L'éclat de sorcellerie, le saut dans l'inconnu, les cris de Solomorne... Il a donné un ordre à Glaito, mais lequel ? Alors que vous tentez de comprendre ce qui s'est passé, vous sombrez de plus en plus dans l'inconscience.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你最后几分钟的记忆断断续续，痛苦不已。你看到了巫术的闪光，你跃入了未知的世界，你听到了索罗蒙高声喊着什么——他对格雷托下了命令，但那究竟是什么命令？你的头脑试图理解之前发生的一切，但却将你拖入更深的无意识之中。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your memories of the last several minutes are incoherent and painful. The flash of sorcery, the leap into the unknown, Solomorne shouting something — he gave Glaito an order, but what order was it? Any attempt you make to process what happened only pulls you deeper into unconsciousness.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你最后几分钟的记忆断断续续，痛苦不已。你看到了巫术的闪光，你跃入了未知的世界，你听到了索罗蒙高声喊着什么——他对格雷托下了命令，但那究竟是什么命令？你的头脑试图理解之前发生的一切，但却将你拖入更深的无意识之中。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Tus recuerdos de los últimos minutos son tan dolorosos como incomprensibles. Un destello de hechicería, un salto a lo desconocido, Solomorne gritando... le ha dado una orden a Glaito, pero ¿en qué consiste? Todo intento de procesar lo sucedido te sume más profundamente en la inconsciencia.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your memories of the last several minutes are incoherent and painful. The flash of sorcery, the leap into the unknown, Solomorne shouting something — he gave Glaito an order, but what order was it? Any attempt you make to process what happened only pulls you deeper into unconsciousness.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Tus recuerdos de los últimos minutos son tan dolorosos como incomprensibles. Un destello de hechicería, un salto a lo desconocido, Solomorne gritando... le ha dado una orden a Glaito, pero ¿en qué consiste? Todo intento de procesar lo sucedido te sume más profundamente en la inconsciencia.{/n}

languages.text: {n}この数分間の記憶は断片的で苦痛に満ちている。魔術の閃光、未知への飛び込み、ソロモーンが何か叫んでいた。彼はグライトに命じたが、その命令が何だったのかはわからない。何とか状況を理解しようとすればするほど、意識の闇に深く沈んでいくばかりだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your memories of the last several minutes are incoherent and painful. The flash of sorcery, the leap into the unknown, Solomorne shouting something — he gave Glaito an order, but what order was it? Any attempt you make to process what happened only pulls you deeper into unconsciousness.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}この数分間の記憶は断片的で苦痛に満ちている。魔術の閃光、未知への飛び込み、ソロモーンが何か叫んでいた。彼はグライトに命じたが、その命令が何だったのかはわからない。何とか状況を理解しようとすればするほど、意識の闇に深く沈んでいくばかりだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Son birkaç dakikaya dair anıların tutarsız ve acı verici. Sahirliğin parıltısı, bilinmeyene sıçrayış, Solomorne'un bağırışları... Glaito'ya bir emir verdi ama ne dedi? Olanları anlamaya çalışmak için yaptığın her girişim seni bilinçsizliğin derinliklerine çekiyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your memories of the last several minutes are incoherent and painful. The flash of sorcery, the leap into the unknown, Solomorne shouting something — he gave Glaito an order, but what order was it? Any attempt you make to process what happened only pulls you deeper into unconsciousness.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Son birkaç dakikaya dair anıların tutarsız ve acı verici. Sahirliğin parıltısı, bilinmeyene sıçrayış, Solomorne'un bağırışları... Glaito'ya bir emir verdi ama ne dedi? Olanları anlamaya çalışmak için yaptığın her girişim seni bilinçsizliğin derinliklerine çekiyor.{/n}
